{{also|退一步海阔天空}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=退一步海阔天空|type=124}}

===Etymology===
Literally: Take one step back, (and you will see) the vastness of the sea and sky.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=tuì yībù hǎikuòtiānkōng
|cat=prov
}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# Sometimes, if you're working too much to solve a problem, it helps to step back from it, and new solutions will often present themselves.
# Yielding (taking a step back), to someone else may make your future that much brighter/easier.
